i've tried this thing in 33cl bottle, the "beer" has a horrible smell of feed for chickens and the bitterness of hops was disgusting, probably a bad bottle but the label was beautyful like the label of the other beer of birrificio pontino,all image and no substance.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

33cl bottle drank in Rome, very nice label but the beer was totally miss. Flat beer just a little bit aromatic. This is just bitter yellow water, how can people drink this s***t???
